definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="916" y="533"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">WEAKNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">HUNGER</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5000</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">MAGIC</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
